summary: I OWN A 1998 PLYMOUTH VOYAGER MINIVAN (VIN #[XXX]) AND HAVE EXPERIENCED A CLOCKSPRING FAILURE WHICH RESULTED IN MY DRIVER'S SIDE AIRBAG, HORN AND CRUISE CONTROL NOT WORKING.  EVEN THOUGH THERE IS A CURRENT RECALL FOR THIS PROBLEM ON THIS MODEL YEAR VEHICLE, THE MANUFACTURER STATED I WAS NOT COVERED SINCE THE BUILD DATE WAS TWO DAYS AFTER THE END OF THE COVERED PERIOD.  THIS SEEMS VERY UNREASONABLE TO ME AND INDICATES THAT MAYBE THE RECALL WAS TOO NARROW.    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
